bfsu: Beijing Foreign Studies University download source
ustc: University of Science and Technology of China download source
requestedTips: The license request has been sent, please be patient and wait If you need to modify the information, you can resend it
autoStartServiceTips: Whether to start services automatically when the application starts
autoHideTips: Whether to hide the main interface and keep only the system tray icon after automatically starting the service
autoLaunchTips: Whether to launch FlyEnv automatically when computer boots
passwordTips: Not required. Automatically fill in password when executing commands. For example, installing and uninstalling using Macports, etc
langTips: Load user-defined language packs. This will also initialize the default language pack, making it easier for users to translate FlyEnv into other languages.
moduleCateDelTips: Modules under this category will also be deleted. Confirm deletion?
moduleIsOnlyRunOne: Only one service can run at a time

module.name: Name
module.needPasswordToStart: Admin rights required. Enter your password (it will be saved for future use). Alternatively, manually enter it in the terminal, but this prompt may reappear.
module.licenseTips: No license found. Only 3 modules/execution items can be created.
